page.title: 06Field Studies Centre
page.content: The{Field Studies Council}moved to{Nettlecombe Court}about 15 years ago. Before that the house was used as {St.Audries Girls School. The Centre accomodates 80{students each week studying{biology}and {geography. }They have some adult visitors who do{painting courses, bird {watching and walking. They{employ}about 20 people each week. Ten people live at the Court all the time the other ten come from {Williton and Watchet. People attending the courses often come from over 200 miles away and there are usually one or two visitors from abroad on each course.
